content: परामर्शः {@--1@} Seizing, pulling; as in केशपरामर्शः. {@--2@} Bending or drawing (as a bow). {@--3@} Violence, attack, assault; याज्ञसेन्याः परामर्शः <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--4@} Disturbance, hindrance; तपःपरामर्शविवृद्धमन्योः <ls>Ku. 3. 71.</ls> {@--5@} Calling to mind, recollection. {@--6@} Consideration, reflection, thought. {@--7@} Judgment. {@--8@} (In logic) Deduction, ascertaining that the पक्ष or subject possesses the हेतु; व्याप्तिविशिष्टपक्षधर्मताज्ञानं परामर्शः T. S; or व्याप्तस्य पक्षधर्मत्वधीः परामर्श उच्यते <ls>Bhāṣā P. 66.</ls> {@--9@} Touching, striking gently. {@--10@} Affection (by disease).
